price: 3. То mpe bakoloba ete ye nde (Muhammad) asali yango na ndenge naye?, kasi yango ezali bosôló kowuta epai ya Nkolo wa yo, mpo ete okebisa na yango bato oyo mokebisi moko te ayela bango liboso nayo, mpo ete bakambama.
arabic: أَمۡ يَقُولُونَ ٱفۡتَرَىٰهُۚ بَلۡ هُوَ ٱلۡحَقُّ مِن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوۡمٗا مَّآ أَتَىٰهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٖ مِّن قَبۡلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: am yaqūlūna if'tarāhu bal huwa al-ḥaqu min rabbika litundhira qawman mā atāhum min nadhīrin min qablika laʿallahum yahtadūna
